parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the listener. The description must be **1** to **80** characters in length.

>  The value cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: EipTransmit
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Elastic IP address (EIP) pass-through. Valid values:

*   **on**
*   **off** (default)

parameters.name: HealthCheckConnectPort
parameters.description: The port that is used for health checks. Valid values: **1** to **65535**. If you leave this parameter empty, the port specified for BackendServerPort is used for health checks.

parameters.name: HealthCheckConnectTimeout
parameters.description:
The timeout period of a health check response. If a backend server does not respond within the specified timeout period, the server fails to pass the health check.

*   Default value: 5.
*   Valid values: **1** to **300**.
*   Unit: seconds.

>  If the value that you specified for HealthCheckConnectTimeout is smaller than the value of HealthCheckInterval, HealthCheckConnectTimeout becomes invalid and the timeout period that you specified for HealthCheckInterval is used.

parameters.name: HealthCheckExp
parameters.description: The response string for UDP listener health checks. The string can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain only letters and digits.

parameters.name: HealthCheckInterval
parameters.description: The interval at which health checks are performed. Valid values: **1** to **50**. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: HealthCheckReq
parameters.description: The request string for UDP listener health checks. The string can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain only letters and digits.

parameters.name: HealthyThreshold
parameters.description: The number of consecutive successful health checks that must occur before an unhealthy and inaccessible backend server is declared healthy and accessible. Valid values: **2** to **10**.

parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description: The frontend port that is used by the ELB instance. Valid values: **1** to **65535**.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the Edge Load Balancer (ELB) instance.

parameters.name: Scheduler
parameters.description:
The routing algorithm. Valid values:

*   **wrr**: Backend servers with higher weights receive more requests than those with lower weights.
*   **wlc**: Requests are distributed based on the weight and load of each backend server. The load refers to the number of connections on a backend server. If two backend servers have the same weight, the backend server that has fewer connections receives more requests.
*   **rr**: Requests are distributed to backend servers in sequence.
*   **sch**: consistent hashing that is based on source IP addresses. Requests from the same source IP address are distributed to the same backend server.
*   **qch**: consistent hashing that is based on QUIC connection IDs. Requests that contain the same QUIC connection ID are distributed to the same backend server.
*   **iqch**: consistent hashing that is based on specific three bytes of the iQUIC CIDs. Requests whose second to fourth bytes are the same are distributed to the same backend server.

parameters.name: UnhealthyThreshold
parameters.description: The number of consecutive failed health checks that must occur before a healthy and accessible backend server is declared unhealthy and inaccessible. Valid values: **2** to **10**.
